name: CUSTOM MEDIA CONTROL FOR SONY BRAVIA TV
Filter
Info - README V2.0
info:
This is version 2.0 of custom media control for SONY BRAVIA TV

In this version, the tv favorites are generated automatically from the TV channel list. 

*************************************************

The following nodes let you implement custom media control for Sony Bravia TV,

**IMPORTANT :** 

 * To avoid your custom code is removed on flow update it is recommended to copy paste the nodes below to a new tab
 * 
 * To avoid unexpected behavior, do not use the CUSTOM MEDIA CONTROL group flow in the HOOKS
 * 
 * To apply this function it to your tv, you need to change the ip address of the tv
 * 
 * To change, go to configurations nodes and find SONY BRAVIA TV node and double click it
 * Change the host to your tv's ip address and type in the PSK and save

> NOTE : It is advised to set a static IP, see the network settings of the TV.


**READ MORE HERE :**

[ https://pro-bravia.sony.net/develop/integrate/ircc-ip/ircc-codes/index.html](BRAVIA Professional Displays Knowledge Center)

[https://developer.sony.com/develop/audio-control-api/api-references/api-overview-2](SONY BRAVIA API References)

name: French favorites (samples)
payload: ["Chaîne","Chaîne une","Chaîne deux","Chaîne trois","Chaîne quatre","Chaîne cinq","Chaîne six","Chaîne sept","Chaîne huit","Chaîne neuf","Chaîne dix","Chaîne onze","Chaîne douze","Chaîne treize","Chaîne quatorze","Chaîne quinze","Chaîne seize","Chaîne dix-sept","Chaîne dix-huit","Chaîne dix-neuf","Chaîne vingt"]

name: lang?
Play
Pause
Set volume
TvList
GET /siteIdTv
GET /siteIdTv
IMPORTANT Manually set the siteIdTv  IMPORTANT
info:
It is strongly recommended to set a valid siteId for the TV (siteIdTv), the place where you place your TV. (eg: bedroom, office, living room)

The siteIdTv's must be an existing room from your installation see PRATGLAD or Aragon application. (e.g PRATGLAD's user interface -> Configure -> no. 3 -> Settings -> Rooms)
